title: Neko ni Naritai Tamagawa-kun

alternative_titles.ja: 猫になりたい田万川くん

synopsis:
For Tamagawa, volunteering at a cat café is the only relief from his stressful job. The manager tells him to, "relax and learn to be spoiled," but he doesn't know what that means until a new customer, Rai Shindou, comes to the café and tells Tamagawa he wants to keep him as a cat! Enter their strange, but fateful relationship. A pure-hearted and soothing romantic comedy.

(Source: Kodansha, translated)
